ThingDef.Name: TechscrollBase
ThingDef.description: A plasteel-polymer storage device which houses an extensive sheet of gold alloy weave, every inch of the substrate is etched with microscopic lines of data which when read correctly can grant your researchers the required information to complete a specific research project.

ThingDef.label: engineering techscroll
ThingDef.description: A plasteel-polymer storage device which houses an extensive sheet of gold alloy weave, every inch of the substrate is etched with microscopic lines of data which when read correctly can grant your researchers the required information to complete a specific research project.\n\nThis scroll appears to be contain knowledge on complex dwarven constructions and designs, like core drills, dwarven turrets and even automatons.

li.completedLetter: By deciphering and translating the ancient techscroll, {PAWN_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.
li.inspectString: Can be analyzed by a colonist.
